trans-unit.source: Contains properties that you can use to query system settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含可用於查詢系統設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border multiplier factor that determines the width of a window's sizing border.
trans-unit.target: 取得框線乘數因數，這個因數會決定視窗縮放邊框的寬度。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.Border`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.Border`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.Border*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the border width of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗中非工作區的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: The metric is obtained from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.BorderWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.BorderWidth*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption height for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗中非工作區的標題高度。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.CaptionHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaptionHeight*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption width for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗中非工作區的標題寬度。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.CaptionWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaptionWidth*> property.
Gets the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯控制項的插入號寬度，以像素。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value; **true** if client area animation is enabled, **false** otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 布林值。**true**如果已啟用工作區動畫， **false**否則。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下拉式功能表靠右對齊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsMenuDropRightAligned*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the system is enabled for Hebrew and Arabic languages.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出系統是否已啟用希伯來文和阿拉伯文語言。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsMiddleEastEnabled`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is enabled for Hebrew and Arabic languages; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系統已啟用希伯來文和阿拉伯文語言。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsMiddleEastEnabled*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether a mouse is installed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已安裝滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: This value is rarely `false`, because virtual mice are supported and because some systems detect the presence of the port, instead of a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此值很少是`false`、 支援虛擬滑鼠，因為某些系統偵測到連接埠，而不是滑鼠的存在。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsMousePresent`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a mouse is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已安裝滑鼠。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsMousePresent*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the installed mouse has a vertical scroll wheel.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所安裝的滑鼠是否具有垂直滾輪。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsMouseWheelPresent`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the installed mouse has a vertical scroll wheel; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所安裝的滑鼠具有垂直滾輪。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsMouseWheelPresent*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for Pen Computing extensions are installed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]for Pen Computing 擴充功能安裝。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsPenWindows`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Pen Computing extensions are installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已安裝 Pen Computing 擴充功能。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsPenWindows*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the current session is remotely controlled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的工作階段是否為遠端控制。

trans-unit.source: This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment.
trans-unit.target: 終端機服務環境中使用此系統標準。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsRemotelyControlled`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current session is remotely controlled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的工作階段為遠端控制。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsRemotelyControlled*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the calling process is associated with a Terminal Services client session.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出呼叫處理是否與終端機服務用戶端工作階段相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment.
trans-unit.target: 終端機服務環境中使用此系統標準。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsRemoteSession`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the calling process is associated with a Terminal Services client session; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the calling process is associated with the Terminal Server console session.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果呼叫處理與終端機服務用戶端的工作階段; 相關聯<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>呼叫處理是否與終端機服務主控台工作階段相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsRemoteSession*> property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the computer has a low-end (slow) processor.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出電腦是否具有低階 （慢速） 處理器。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsSlowMachine`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the computer has a low-end (slow) processor; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果電腦具有低階 （慢速） 處理器。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsSlowMachine*> property.

Gets a value that indicates whether the current operating system is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tpc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tpc-md.md)] Edition.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前作業系統是否為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tpc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tpc-md.md)]版本。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.IsTabletPC`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.IsTabletPC`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current operating system is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-whistler-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tpc](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-tpc-md.md)] Edition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的作業系統是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-whistler-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tpc](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-tpc-md.md)] Edition，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IsTabletPC*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the height, in pixels, of the kanji window at the bottom of the screen for systems that use double-byte characters.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用雙位元組字元之系統螢幕底端的漢字視窗的像素為單位的高度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.KanjiWindowHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KanjiWindowHeight*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether menu access keys are always underlined.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否功能表便捷鍵是否一律加上底線。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.KeyboardCues`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if menu access keys are always underlined; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if they are underlined only when the menu is activated by the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果功能表便捷鍵一律加上底線。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果只有在由鍵盤啟動功能表時，才會以底線標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardCues*> property.
Gets the keyboard repeat-delay setting, which is a value in the range from 0 (approximately 250 milliseconds delay) through 3 (approximately 1 second delay).
trans-unit.target: 取得鍵盤重複延遲設定，也就是從 0 （大約 250 毫秒延遲） 範圍內的值到 3 （大約延遲 1 秒）。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether the user relies on the keyboard instead of the mouse, and whether the user wants applications to display keyboard interfaces that are typically hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否依賴鍵盤而非滑鼠，而且使用者是否要應用程式顯示通常隱藏的鍵盤介面。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.KeyboardPreference`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user relies on the keyboard; otherwise,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者依賴鍵盤。否則，<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardPreference*> property.
Gets the keyboard repeat-speed setting, which is a value in the range from 0 (approximately 2.5 repetitions per second) through 31 (approximately 30 repetitions per second).
trans-unit.target: 取得鍵盤重複速度設定，這介於 0 （大約重複 2.5 次每秒鐘） 中的值到 31 （大約重複 30 次每秒鐘）。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether the smooth-scrolling effect for list boxes is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出清單方塊的平滑捲動效果是否已啟用。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.ListBoxSmoothScrolling`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the smooth-scrolling effect is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用平滑捲動效果;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.ListBoxSmoothScrolling*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the height, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主顯示器上最大化最上層視窗的像素為單位的高度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MaximizedPrimaryScreenHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MaximizedPrimaryScreenHeight*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the width, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主顯示器上最大化最上層視窗的像素為單位的寬度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MaximizedPrimaryScreenWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MaximizedPrimaryScreenWidth*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the maximum height, in pixels, of a window that has a caption and sizing borders.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出具有標題和縮放邊框之視窗的像素為單位的最大高度。

trans-unit.source: This metric refers to the entire desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此標準會參考整個桌面。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot drag the window frame to a height larger than this dimension.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法為高度大於這個維度拖曳視窗框架。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MaximumWindowTrackHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MaximumWindowTrackHeight*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the maximum width, in pixels, of a window that has a caption and sizing borders.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出具有標題和縮放邊框之視窗的像素為單位的最大寬度。

trans-unit.source: This metric refers to the entire desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此標準會參考整個桌面。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot drag the window frame to a width larger than this dimension.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法拖曳視窗框架寬度大於這個維度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MaximumWindowTrackWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MaximumWindowTrackWidth*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether the menu animation feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已啟用功能表動畫功能。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuAnimation`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if menu animation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用功能表動畫。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuAnimation*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the height, in pixels, of a single-line menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出單行功能表列的像素為單位的高度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuBarHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: The height of the menu bar.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuBarHeight*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the height, in pixels, of a menu bar button.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出功能表列按鈕的像素為單位的高度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuButtonHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: The height of a menu bar button.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuButtonHeight*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the width, in pixels, of a menu bar button.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出功能表列按鈕的像素為單位的寬度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuButtonWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: The width of a menu bar button.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuButtonWidth*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the height, in pixels, of the default menu check-mark bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出預設功能表核取記號點陣圖的像素為單位的高度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuCheckmarkHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuCheckmarkHeight*> property.
Gets a value that indicates the width, in pixels, of the default menu check-mark bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出預設功能表核取記號點陣圖的像素為單位的寬度。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuCheckmarkWidth`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuCheckmarkWidth*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether pop-up menus are left-aligned or right-aligned, relative to the corresponding menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出快顯功能表，靠左對齊還是靠右對齊，相對於對應的功能表項目。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if left-aligned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果是靠左對齊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment*> property.
Gets a value indicating whether menu fade animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出功能表淡出動畫是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: If fade animation is disabled, menus use slide animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果淡出動畫已停用，功能表使用投影片動畫。

trans-unit.source: This flag is ignored unless menu animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 除非已啟用功能表動畫，則會忽略此旗標。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.MenuFade`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuFade`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when fade animation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>當淡出動畫已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuFade*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the height of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於決定功能表高度的度量資訊。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.MenuHeight`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuHeight`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuHeight*> property.
Gets the system value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation*> property for menus.

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuPopupAnimation`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuPopupAnimation*> property.
Gets the time, in milliseconds, that the system waits before displaying a shortcut menu when the mouse cursor is over a submenu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得時間，以毫秒為單位，系統會顯示捷徑功能表，當滑鼠游標位於子功能表項目之前。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuShowDelay`}`"/ >

Gets the metric that determines the width of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於決定功能表寬度的度量資訊。
取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.MenuWidth`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MenuWidth`}`"/ >
功能表寬度 （單位為像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuWidth*> property.
Gets the animation effects associated with user actions.
trans-unit.target: 取得與使用者動作相關聯的動畫效果。

trans-unit.source: The SPI_GETANIMATION system parameter gets an [ANIMATIONINFO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/animationinfo_str.asp) structure.
If the *iMinAnimate* member of the structure is non-zero the minimize animation effects are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果*iMinAnimate*結構成員為非零的最小化動畫效果會啟用。
# # XAML 屬性使用方式*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.MinimizeAnimation`}`"/ >

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the minimize window animations feature is enabled; otherwise,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用最小化視窗動畫功能。否則，<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>。
